column4: Hi! I think I have a peculiar prob. with ubuntu.. Can anybody help?
I don't see many of the things people seem to see in synaptic...
you may not have all the repositories enabled
you just won't get backports with that one, which you may want.
err, yeah. Ubuntu Universe/Multiverse repositories are on the net
Is KDE installed with ubuntu?
no, but it is with Kubuntu. You can easily install it from Ubuntu with a net connection
:-( net connection is my CHIEF problem with ubuntu
why isn't it working? What's the prob?
is that computer not on a network?
oh :S. You might still be able to get it running, though personally I think it's easily worth just getting a router
well, router? what's it?
it's kind of a modem and a hub combined. It stays always connected to the net, and you just plug up any computers to it to get the connection
they're cheap too
No, I have the driver for the WinModem(though it's a miniscule 14.4 one). Yet, it's not working...
I'm gonna buy a new external modem but for the present?
no point getting just a modem when you can get a router, really
how much will that cost?
not much. They're around 35 here
where?
it doesn't connect to the net as conventional modems; it's always connected, and so any computer you can just plug up and it connects
of course, big advantage is taht it's a hub, too
GBP
Sorry, but what's GBP? Which country?
